queries.name: Precautions for all drugs for AIDS
Precautions for all drugs for AIDS
First 100 drugs with "aspir* cancer" in the name
First 100 drugs with "aspir" in the name
queries.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX fti: <http://franz.com/ns/allegrograph/2.2/textindex/>

SELECT ?label WHERE {
  ?b1 fti:match "aspir*"^^xsd:string.
  ?b1 rdfs:label ?label.
} LIMIT 100
